Certainly! The video you provided is a scene from the popular TV show "Friends," specifically Season 2, Episode 14 titled "The One with Ross's New Girlfriend."
In this episode, Rachel Green (played by Jennifer Aniston) has just broken up with her boyfriend Barry and moves in with Joey Tribbiani (Matt LeBlanc). Meanwhile, Monica Geller (Courteney Cox) introduces Chandler Bing (Matthew Perry) to his new girlfriend, Jill. However, things take an unexpected turn when it becomes clear that Chandler still harbor feelings forMonica despite being in a relationshipwithJill. This leads himto make awkward attempts at flirting wit hher while avoidin g eye contact .
